abort.cloud_not_connected: Not connected to Home Assistant Cloud.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.
abort.webhook_not_internet_accessible: Your Home Assistant instance needs to be accessible from the internet to receive webhook messages.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to set up [webhook integration of Dialogflow]({dialogflow_url}).

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST
- Content Type: application/json

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

user.description: Are you sure you want to set up Dialogflow?
user.title: Set up the Dialogflow Webhook
